0.name: Sawblade Tuning
0.fullDesc: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Himeko's ATK to a single enemy.
0.shortDesc: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single enemy.

0.name: Molten Detonation
0.fullDesc: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Himeko's ATK to a single enemy and Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of Himeko's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.
0.shortDesc: Deals Fire DMG to a single enemy and minor Fire DMG to enemies adjacent to it.

0.name: Heavenly Flare
0.fullDesc: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Himeko's ATK to all enemies. Himeko regenerates <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> extra Energy for each enemy defeated.
0.shortDesc: Deals Fire DMG to all enemies and regenerates Energy if enemies are defeated.

0.name: Incomplete Combustion
0.fullDesc: After using Technique, creates a dimension that lasts for <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> second(s). After entering battle with enemies in the dimension, there is a <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> <u>base chance</u> to increase Fire DMG taken by enemies by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s). Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.
0.shortDesc: Creates a dimension. After entering combat with enemies in the dimension, there is a high chance to <color=#f29e38ff>increase Fire DMG taken by enemies</color>.

0.name: Attack
0.fullDesc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.
